items.title: Awesome Game Engine Dev
items.content_text:
### Game Engines / Specialty

*   üí∏ [Unbound](https://www.unbound.io/) - SDF‚Äëpowered game engine. Intuitively sculpt & script 3D games.

### Libraries / BASIC

*   üìö [Awesome Basic (‚≠ê104)](https://github.com/JohnBlood/awesome-basic) - List of awesome BASIC dialects, IDEs, and tutorials.

### Libraries / Dart

*   Dart: Game Framework
    *   üéâ [Flame (‚≠ê10k)](https://github.com/flame-engine/flame) - Minimalist *Flutter* based 2D game engine. \[[Awesome (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/flame-engine/awesome-flame#readme) | [Examples](https://examples.flame-engine.org/#/) | [Website](https://flame-engine.org/)]

### Open Source Games / C++

*   üîí [zDoom (‚≠ê2.8k)](https://github.com/ZDoom/gzdoom) - Modern, feature centric port for all Doom engine games.

### Tools / Software / AI Assistants

*   üí∏ [Coplay](https://www.coplay.dev?ref=github\&utm_source=stevinz_awesome_game_engine_dev) - Multi-agent AI Assistant for all aspects of Unity game developement.
*   üí∏ [Unity Muse](https://unity.com/products/muse) - Unity's suite of AI products.

### Tools / Software / Modeling Tools

*   üí∏ [ZBrush](https://www.maxon.net/en/zbrush) - Simple and easy to use 3D sculpting tool.

items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
### Community

*   [Angular talents](https://www.angulartalents.com/) - Angular talents empowers independent developers available for their next gig. Stop scouring job boards and sit back as companies reach out to you first.

### AI / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [hashbrown (‚≠ê111)](https://github.com/liveloveapp/hashbrown) - [Hashbrown](https://hashbrown.dev/) is a framework for building joyful, AI-powered user experiences.

### Feature Flags / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [@flagpole/angular](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@flagpole/angular) - Angular SDK for the [Flagpole](https://useflagpole.dev/) feature flag management system. Provides real-time feature flag updates, A/B testing capabilities, and seamless integration with Angular applications.

### Dates / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-daterangepicker-pro (‚≠ê0)](https://github.com/Abhinavgaur01/ngx-daterangepicker-pro-demo) - A powerful, customizable Angular date range picker built with Angular 17+ and [Day.js (‚≠ê48k)](https://github.com/iamkun/dayjs).
*   [ngx-custom-daterangepicker (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/nedpuganti/ngx-custom-daterangepicker) - An Angular date range picker component with advanced functionality and Material Design support. It allows for easy date range selection with customizable options and is simple to integrate.

### Scroll / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-perfect-scrollbar-portable (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/brakmic/ngx-perfect-scrollbar-portable) - Angular wrapper library for Perfect Scrollbar.
items.content_html:

  • Angular talents - Angular talents empowers independent developers available for their next gig. Stop scouring job boards and sit back as companies reach out to you first.

AI / Google Developer Experts

  • hashbrown (‚≠ê111) - Hashbrown is a framework for building joyful, AI-powered user experiences.

items.title: Awesome D
items.content_text:
### Web Frameworks

*   [dlang-requests (‚≠ê158)](https://github.com/ikod/dlang-requests) - HTTP client library inspired by python-requests
*   [Handy-Httpd (‚≠ê37)](https://github.com/andrewlalis/handy-httpd) - A simple, lightweight, and well-documented HTTP server that lets you bootstrap ideas and have something up and running in minutes.
*   [serverino (‚≠ê73)](https://github.com/trikko/serverino) - Small and ready-to-go http server, in D
*   [Apache Thrift](https://code.dlang.org/packages/apache-thrift) - A lightweight, language-independent, featureful RPC framework.  Thrift provides clean abstractions for data transport, data serialization, code generation, and application level processing. [Apache Thrift Page](https://thrift.apache.org/)

### CLI Libraries

*   [argsd (‚≠ê16)](https://github.com/burner/argsd) - A command line and config file parser for DLang
*   [scriptlike (‚≠ê94)](https://github.com/Abscissa/scriptlike) - Utility library to aid writing script-like programs in D.
*   [d-colorize](https://code.dlang.org/packages/colorize) - A port of the ruby library [colorize (‚≠ê1.3k)](https://github.com/fazibear/colorize). It add some methods to set color, background color and text effect on console easier using ANSI escape sequences.
*   [dexpect (‚≠ê13)](https://github.com/grogancolin/dexpect/) -  A D implementation of the expect framework. Handy for bash emulation.
*   [Argon (‚≠ê17)](https://github.com/markuslaker/Argon) -  A processor for command-line arguments, an alternative to Getopt, written in D.

### GUI Libraries

*   [giD (‚≠ê25)](https://github.com/Kymorphia/gid) - GObject Introspection D Package Repository.
*   [Fluid](https://git.samerion.com/Samerion/Fluid) - A declarative cross-platform user interface library for D.

### GUI Applications

*   [tilix (‚≠ê5.5k)](https://github.com/gnunn1/tilix) - A tiling terminal emulator for Linux using GTK+ 3.

### Games

*   [Worms Within](https://kapendev.itch.io/worms-within) - A bite-sized escape room game.
*   [Clean & Haunted](https://kapendev.itch.io/clean-haunted) - Clean a spooky haunted house.
*   [Runani](https://kapendev.itch.io/runani) - An endless runner game where you help cute animals.
*   [A Short Metamorphosis](https://kapendev.itch.io/a-short-metamorphosis) - A cute visual novel about looking at an egg.
items.content_html:
Web Frameworks

  • dlang-requests (‚≠ê158) - HTTP client library inspired by python-requests
  • Handy-Httpd (‚≠ê37) - A simple, lightweight, and well-documented HTTP server that lets you bootstrap ideas and have something up and running in minutes.
  • serverino (‚≠ê73) - Small and ready-to-go http server, in D
  • Apache Thrift - A lightweight, language-independent, featureful RPC framework. Thrift provides clean abstractions for data transport, data serialization, code generation, and application level processing. Apache Thrift Page

CLI Libraries

  • argsd (‚≠ê16) - A command line and config file parser for DLang
  • scriptlike (‚≠ê94) - Utility library to aid writing script-like programs in D.
  • d-colorize - A port of the ruby library colorize (‚≠ê1.3k). It add some methods to set color, background color and text effect on console easier using ANSI escape sequences.
  • dexpect (‚≠ê13) - A D implementation of the expect framework. Handy for bash emulation.
  • Argon (‚≠ê17) - A processor for command-line arguments, an alternative to Getopt, written in D.

GUI Libraries

  • giD (‚≠ê25) - GObject Introspection D Package Repository.
  • Fluid - A declarative cross-platform user interface library for D.

GUI Applications

  • tilix (‚≠ê5.5k) - A tiling terminal emulator for Linux using GTK+ 3.

Games

  • Worms Within - A bite-sized escape room game.
  • Clean & Haunted - Clean a spooky haunted house.
  • Runani - An endless runner game where you help cute animals.
  • A Short Metamorphosis - A cute visual novel about looking at an egg.

items.title: Awesome Tailwindcss
items.content_text:
### Useful links

*   üíô [Tailwind Plus](https://tailwindcss.com/plus) - UI blocks, templates, and a UI kit by the Tailwind CSS team.

### IDE extensions

*   üíô [Intellisense for Code](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=bradlc.vscode-tailwindcss) - Provides IntelliSense in Visual Studio Code.

### Tools

*   üé®üåçüîß [UI colors](https://uicolors.app/create) - Color palette generator for Tailwind CSS.
*   üé®üåçüîß [Hypercolor](https://hypercolor.dev/) - Collection of Tailwind CSS gradients with directional options.
*   üé®üåçüîß [Inclusive colors](https://www.inclusivecolors.com/) - Create fine-tuned WCAG accessible Tailwind CSS color palettes.
*   üíº [Config viewer (‚≠ê2.2k)](https://github.com/rogden/tailwind-config-viewer) - Local UI tool for visualizing your Tailwind CSS configuration file.
*   üíº [Raycast extension](https://www.raycast.com/vimtor/tailwindcss) - Search classes, documentation and colors in Raycast Launcher.
*   üíº [NativeWind](https://www.nativewind.dev) - NativeWind uses Tailwind CSS as scripting language to create a universal style system for React Native.
*   üåê [Gimli Tailwind](https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/gimli-tailwind/fojckembkmaoehhmkiomebhkcengcljl) - Smart tools for Tailwind CSS as a browser extension.
*   üåê [CSS Variables Editor](https://www.cssvariables.com) - AI-powered Chrome extension for managing colors in daisyUI and shadcn/ui.
*   üåê [DivMagic](https://divmagic.com) - Copy any web element and style as Tailwind CSS component.

### UI libraries, components & templates

*   üíôüß© [Tailwind UI](https://tailwindcss.com/plus/ui-blocks/marketing) - Component library made with Tailwind CSS.
*   üíôüìö [Headless UI](https://headlessui.com/) - Completely unstyled, fully accessible UI components.
*   üíôüìÅ [Catalyst](https://tailwindcss.com/plus/ui-kit) - Beautiful, accessible application UI kit for React.
*   üß© [shadcn UI](https://ui.shadcn.com) - Re-usable components built using Radix UI and Tailwind CSS.
*   üß© [Layouts for Tailwind](https://layoutsfortailwind.lalokalabs.dev) - Layouts and UI patterns for Tailwind CSS.
*   üß© [Ripple UI](https://www.ripple-ui.com) - Clean, modern and beautiful Tailwind CSS components.
*   üß© [8bitcn UI](https://8bitcn.com) - Re-usable retro components built using Shadcn UI and Tailwind CSS.
*   üß© [Xtend UI (‚≠ê437)](https://github.com/xtendui/xtendui) - Tailwind CSS components with advanced interactions and animations.
*   üß© [Tremor](https://tremor.so) - React library to build charts and dashboards with Tailwind CSS.
*   üìö [Daisy UI (‚≠ê38k)](https://github.com/saadeghi/daisyui) - UI Components for Tailwind CSS.
*   üìö [Flowbite](https://flowbite.com/docs/getting-started/introduction/) - Component library built with Tailwind CSS.
*   üìö [STDF](https://stdf.design) - Mobile web component library based on Svelte and Tailwind CSS.
*   üìö [Preline UI](https://preline.co) - Open-source Tailwind CSS components library for any needs.
*   üìö [Date picker (‚≠ê147)](https://github.com/themesberg/tailwind-datepicker) - Adds a datepicker component built with Tailwind CSS and vanilla JavaScript.
*   üìÅ [Built at lightspeed](https://www.builtatlightspeed.com/) - Massive directory of 500+ Tailwind templates, starters and UI kits.
*   üìÅ [Statichunt](https://statichunt.com/tailwind-templates) - Open source directory of hand-picked free and premium Tailwind templates & starters.

### Plugins

*   üíôüß© [Typography (‚≠ê5.6k)](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss-typography) - Adds a `prose` class for beautiful typographic defaults.
*   üíô [Forms (‚≠ê4.4k)](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss-forms) - Adds better default styles to form elements.
*   üé® [Themer (‚≠ê309)](https://github.com/RyanClementsHax/tailwindcss-themer) - Adds theming support for Tailwind CSS with CSS variables and variants.
*   üíº [Bootstrap grid (‚≠ê184)](https://github.com/karolis-sh/tailwind-bootstrap-grid) - Generates Bootstrap's style flexbox grid system.
*   üíº [Dot & grid backgrounds (‚≠ê31)](https://github.com/TheNaubit/tailwind-dot-grid-backgrounds) - Adds `bg-grid` and `bg-dot` classes to add easy-to-customize grid and dot pattern backgrounds with just CSS.
*   üíº [Leading Trim (‚≠ê113)](https://github.com/stormwarning/tailwindcss-capsize) - Adds utilities to trim text whitespace, using [Capsize (‚≠ê1.6k)](https://github.com/seek-oss/capsize).
*   üíº [Scrollbar Hide (‚≠ê281)](https://github.com/reslear/tailwind-scrollbar-hide) - Adds `scrollbar-hide` class for visual hide scrollbar.
*   üíº [px to viewport (‚≠ê2)](https://github.com/the-lemonboy/tailwindcss-px-to-viewport) - Adds utilities to automatically convert px to vw / vh.
*   üíºüß© [Fluid (‚≠ê1.7k)](https://github.com/barvian/fluid-tailwind) - Adds fluid `clamp()` versions of every built-in utility.
*   üß© [Debug screens (‚≠ê659)](https://github.com/jorenvanhee/tailwindcss-debug-screens) - Adds a component that shows the currently active screen (responsive breakpoint).

items.title: Awesome Mac
items.content_text:
### Download Management Tools / Audio Record and Process

*   [Free Download Manager](https://www.freedownloadmanager.org/) - A powerful, easy-to-use, and completely free download accelerator and manager. ![Freeware](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-free.svg "Freeware")
items.content_html:
Download Management Tools / Audio Record and Process

  • Free Download Manager - A powerful, easy-to-use, and completely free download accelerator and manager.

items.title: Awesome Agi Cocosci
items.content_text:
### Domain Specific Language / Imperative DSL Applications

*   [Organic synthesis in a modular robotic system driven by a chemical programming language](https://www.science.org/doi/full/10.1126/science.aav2211) - ***Science***, 2019. \[[All Versions](https://scholar.google.com/scholar?cluster=13920677955690815682)]. \[[Preprint](https://www.chem.gla.ac.uk/cronin/images/pubs/387-Steiner-ScienceJan19.full.pdf)]. \[[Perspective: Democratizing synthesis by automation](https://www.science.org/doi/10.1126/science.aav8816)]. This paper develops an autonomous compiler and robotic laboratory platform to synthesize organic compounds on the basis of standardized methods descriptions. The platform comprises conventional equipment such as round-bottom flasks, separatory funnels, and a rotary evaporator to maximize its compatibility with extant literature. The authors showcase the system with short syntheses of three common pharmaceuticals that proceeded comparably to manual synthesis.
items.content_html:
Domain Specific Language / Imperative DSL Applications

  • Organic synthesis in a modular robotic system driven by a chemical programming language - Science, 2019. [All Versions]. [Preprint]. [Perspective: Democratizing synthesis by automation]. This paper develops an autonomous compiler and robotic laboratory platform to synthesize organic compounds on the basis of standardized methods descriptions. The platform comprises conventional equipment such as round-bottom flasks, separatory funnels, and a rotary evaporator to maximize its compatibility with extant literature. The authors showcase the system with short syntheses of three common pharmaceuticals that proceeded comparably to manual synthesis.
